name: @danieltalx/jobber-shared
description: Helpers library for Jobber ms app

scripts.build-old: npm run build:cjs && npm run build:esm && tsc --outDir build/src && node scripts/build-package.js
scripts.build:cjs: NODE_ENV=production BABEL_ENV=cjs babel src --presets=./scripts/babel-preset.js --extensions .ts,.tsx --ignore src/**/*.specs.tsx --out-dir build/cjs --source-maps
scripts.build:esm: NODE_ENV=production BABEL_ENV=esm babel src --presets=./scripts/babel-preset.js --extensions .ts,.tsx --ignore src/**/*.specs.tsx --out-dir build/esm --source-maps
scripts.clean: rm -rf node_modules && rm -rf dist && npm i && npm run build
scripts.windows-build:cjs: cross-env NODE_ENV=production BABEL_ENV=cjs babel src --presets=./scripts/babel-preset.js --extensions .ts,.tsx --ignore src/**/*.specs.tsx --out-dir build/cjs --source-maps
scripts.windows-build:esm: cross-env NODE_ENV=production BABEL_ENV=esm babel src --presets=./scripts/babel-preset.js --extensions .ts,.tsx --ignore src/**/*.specs.tsx --out-dir build/esm --source-maps
scripts.pack: rm -rf build/* && rm -rf packs/* && npm run build && cd packs && npm pack ../ && cd ..

author: danieltalx
